data.name: Coffee Crisis - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Get ready to bang your head!

Love the music from Coffee Crisis? Now you can listen to it any time that you want by picking up the soundtrack right on Steam! The soundtrack features all 12 original songs that were composed for the game ready to play with the Steam Music Player. So grab it now and crank it up to 11.

Track listing:

1. Intro - 00:36
2. Reach for Home - 04:44
3. Black Forge - 01:16
4. Overruled by Fate - 01:35
5. Intro Pt. 2 - 00:35
6. Deny Me This - 03:35
7. Ascension - 01:28
8. Escaping the Shadows - 02:07
9. Power-up - 00:13
10. Tizzy - 05:52
11. Escaping the Shadows Pt. 2 - 01:03
12. Game Cleared - 00:20

The soundtrack is in MP3 format and will be installed to "../steamapps/common/Coffee Crisis/Soundtrack"

The soundtrack features all 12 original songs that were composed for the game ready to play with the Steam Music Player. So grab it now and crank it up to 11.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 32bit
  • Processor: 2.0+ Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Quadro K2000M or better (2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX
  • Processor: 2.0+ Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Quadro K2000M or better (2GB VRAM)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX
  • Processor: 2.0+ Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Quadro K2000M or better (2GB VRAM)

  • Graphics: NVidia Quadro K2000M or better (2GB VRAM)
